original_text: Thou shalt keep therefore his statutes, and his commandments, which I command thee this day, that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, and that thou mayest prolong thy days upon the earth, which the Lord thy God giveth thee, for ever.
korean_text: 오늘 내가 네게 명령하는 여호와의 규례와 명령을 지키라 너와 네 후손이 복을 받아 네 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주시는 땅에서 한 없이 오래 살리라

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt keep therefore his statutes
which I command thee this day
that it may go well with thee
and with thy children after thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 뒤를 이을 네 자손에게도 잘 되게 하기 위함이라

sentences.original_text: and that thou mayest prolong thy days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 네 날을 길게 하기 위함이니

sentences.original_text: which the Lord thy God giveth thee
